name: Temple Breach
description:
Genre: Platform-Shooter

Platform: Windows

Gameplay:
• 2D platform-shooter - Jump to overcome obstacles and stun enemies
• Dynamic enemy combat  - Enemies actively react to player’s behaviour
• Replayability - Enemies are never the same on higher levels
• Three different weapons - Single target, AoE damage, and AoE slow    
• Power-Ups - Weapons evolve in both power and fire rate 

Story: 
A modern-day explorer reaches the coast of South America in the hopes of discovering and exploring a lost Inca Temple. 
Legends say this temple was built to block a passage to another universe. As the player explores the temple, he mistankenly creates an opening and dangerous creatures are unleashed.  
Now the player has to ensure that no creatures escape and close every breach.
